roles.title: Platform Reliability Manager
roles.description: Detect and address patterns of behavior that impact platform service level objectives. Analyze and report platform health data. Manage on-call rotations and cross-team incident response.

roles.title: Support Manager
roles.description: Mentored a remote team of senior support engineers. Developed CLI tools and Zendesk apps to improve team workflows. Analyzed data to forecast staffing needs.

roles.title: Senior Customer Success Engineer
roles.description: Provided technical guidance to developers working on the Pantheon platform. Resolved application performance and security escalations. Created documentation and trainings for the CSE team.

roles.title: Senior Developer/Tech Lead
roles.description: Agile back-end website development for large non-profits, unions, and universities. Created technical implementation specs and led teams through the build process.

node.company: American Public Media | Minnesota Public Radio

roles.title: Web Developer
roles.description: Developed CMS-driven solutions for multimedia content creation and syndication for public radio programs. Worked with Ruby on Rails, Drupal and various frontend technologies.

roles.title: Multimedia Designer
roles.description: Designed and developed hands-on exhibits, data visualizations, and interactive digital experiences. Full-stack development work utilizing JavaScript, Python, PHP, and SQL.
